title: Region defined by hor. line and quartic function part - b

content.description: Let R be the region enclosed by the graph of f(x)=x4-2.3x3+4 and the horizontal line y=4, as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is an isosceles right triangle with a leg in R. Find the volume of the solid.

frqParts.text: Region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is an isosceles right triangle with a leg in R. Find the volume of the solid.

topic.text: 8.8: Volumes with Cross Sections - Triangles and Semicircles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
